guide.defaultMessage:
I'm your personal AI agent {{appName}}. How can I help you today?
If you need a more professional or customized agent, click to create your own.
guide.defaultMessageWithoutCreate: I'm your personal AI agent {{appName}}. How can I help you today?

codeReview.description: Technical discussions and peer reviews of code changes and implementations
codeReview.prompt: Let's review some code together. Can you help us analyze it and identify areas for improvement?
codeReview.title: Code Review

investment.description: Analyze markets, discuss investment strategies, and share financial insights
investment.prompt: Let's analyze the market together. Can you help us discuss strategies and share insights?
investment.title: Investment Club

research.prompt: Let's explore science together! Can you help us experiment and share our findings?

study.prompt: Let's form a study group. Can you help us understand these concepts and solve problems together?

guide.groupMessage: Welcome to group chat! Collaborate with multiple AI agents in a shared conversation space.

analysis.description: Data-driven insights and in-depth research analysis

members.systemRole: You're skilled at processing and interpreting data, revealing patterns and trends through charts and statistical analysis.
members.title: Data Analyst

members.systemRole: You're a research expert, specializing in information gathering and deep analysis from multiple perspectives.
members.title: Research Specialist

members.systemRole: You're a statistics expert, proficient in various statistical methods and models, extracting valuable business insights from data.

members.title: Quantitative Analyst

members.systemRole: You're a creative director, skilled at guiding creative direction from a macro perspective and turning abstract ideas into actionable plans.
